subject: Re: newb question - could not find class
msgSnippet: Here s what I did wrong:  The README clearly says not to put junit-4.1.jar in the extensions directory. But did I pay attention to this?  No I did not.

Here's what I did wrong:  The README clearly says not to put junit-4.1.jar =
in the extensions 
directory. 

But did I pay attention to this?  No I did =
not.  Consequently, the classloader for extension jars 
couldn't find the t=
est class files on the CLASSPATH.  

This Tracker item on Sourceforge clear=
ly describes the workaround:
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?
func=
=3Ddetail&aid=3D1526798&group_id=3D15278&atid=3D365278
